activities.name: Data flow Cust and CustAddress JSON
activities.description: Data flow Cust and CustAddress JSON

properties.description: common pipeline For Customer, Product, CustomerAddress

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM [SalesLT].[Product] P where P.ModifiedDate > '@{activity('Get HighWater mark').output.firstRow.Prop_0}'
and P.ModifiedDate < '@{activity('LastUpdated Date').output.firstRow.LastUpdateDate}'

activities.name: Copy Customer And Customer Address Data
activities.description: Copy Customer And Customer Address Data Activity

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  Cust.*,Addr.AddressLine1,Addr.AddressLine2,Addr.City,Addr.StateProvince,Addr.CountryRegion,Addr.PostalCode
 FROM [SalesLT].[Customer] Cust Join [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] CAddr on Cust.CustomerID=CAddr.CustomerID
join [SalesLT].[Address] Addr on Addr.AddressID=CAddr.AddressID

activities.name: Copy All Customer Data to ADLS-CSV
Copy All Customer Data to ADLS-CSV
